Title: FLOSS Weekly 743: Data Is Surprisingly Exciting - Apache SeaTunnel, William Kwok
Description:
William Kwok speaks with Doc Searls and Shawn Powers about Apache SeaTunnel, an exciting and extremely useful open-source way to synchronize multiple databases.

Hosts: Doc Searls and Shawn Powers

Guest: William Kwok

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/floss-weekly

Think your open source project should be on FLOSS Weekly? Email floss@twit.tv.
